ðŸ“– Summary: LotusDB is a high-performance key-value store written in Go. It combines the strengths of both LSM trees and B+ trees to achieve fast read/write speeds and reduced space amplification. It is designed as an optimized alternative to existing key-value stores like Badger and Bolt.
